TopicTitle: Good Designs for Base Assembly Rovers?

Articles.Content: I am currently working on a Duna base, and wish to have some sort of rover assembly, and my current design isn't making the cut. It flips out when I try to drive it. Is there a solid, reliable design for a majority of celestial bodies?
I'm not sure, but wheels are know to be buggy in the latest version. If it looks reasonable and doesn't work, chances are they are just glitching.

If it flips increase the spread of the wheels in relation to each other. Keep the center of mass low and add a reaction wheel but remember to set the sas to sas only. No pilot input or it will flip even more.
This (eventual) exchange of craft has been moved to Spacecraft Exchange.
